page.title: 15 PETS & HOBBIES
page.content:
---PETS--- Many people have pets either for a guard or for the enjoyment of one.I found that in my class the most common pet was a cat.The least common were chicken and tortoise.Here are the results of my survey: TORTOISE-1 CHICKEN-1 DUCK-2 BIRD-2 GUINEA-PIG-3 HAMSTER-4 FROG-4 RABBIT-5 FISH-7 DOG-10 CAT-13
---HOBBIES--- Hobbies are things that people do for enjoyment. Here is a list to show the hobbies of the children in my class.
Drawing 2 Horseriding 3 Swimming 3 keyring collecting 1 collecting books 1 Football and Cricket 3 Fishing 1 Trains 1 Making planes 1 Collecting stamps 2 Rugby 1 Woodwork 1.
